text: One day a frog from its swamp cried out to the other animals: "I am a doctor and I know all the remedies for all ailments very well! A woman said to him, "How dare you tell others you helped others, when you are a cripple and do not know how to heal yourself?" Never proclaim yourself to be what you cannot prove by example.
title: La rana que decía ser médico y la zorra
author: nan Esopo
